text: @MeetThePress Either it was your lousy intelligence institutions or they just hid it to damage your election bid. I agree. WHO knew that something fishing was going on. A contractor cell was on this Covid19 attack.Did you ask Prince Bin Salman if he knew something? Neocons ?🇮🇱lobby? Merkel?
